timeline.message: Refactor of JJBB defs and add load-testing job

timeline.bodyText:
It does exist already -> https://apm-ci.elastic.co/job/apm-agent-java/job/apm-agent-java-mbp/
If it's a MBP I'd say to rename also the file with the suffix -mbp, otherwise defaults.yml got the project-type: multibranch (https://github.com/elastic/apm-agent-java/pull/1475/files#diff-6937eb1bbdbfdece6f197a89b4cec68402f936b219f4b98866a8f6ad2d8fce85R12)

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                name: apm-agent-java/apm-agent-java-mbp
          
          
            
                name: apm-agent-java/apm-agent-java-load-mbp
timeline.author: v1v
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+##### LOAD TESTING JOB
+- job:
+    name: apm-agent-java/apm-agent-java-mbp

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                name: apm-agent-java/apm-agent-java-load-mbp
          
          
            
                name: apm-agent-java/apm-agent-java-load
timeline.author: v1v
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+##### LOAD TESTING JOB
+- job:
+    name: apm-agent-java/apm-agent-java-load-mbp
